bwwExcerpt: "M. Butterfly," which officially returned to Broadway on Thursday night with a marquee director in Julie Taymor, a big star in Clive Owen and a significantly revised script from Hwang, is now an entirely different and very complicated proposition. The power balance between West and East has been transformed: Hwang himself acknowledged this in his underappreciated 2011 comedy "Chinglish," a play that displays much ambivalence about the so-called new China and is very much in dialogue with "M.
